msg: Step 2 in sample refactoring - create J2EE directory

author: danj
msg: Refactoring J2EE samples so they are under one directory and all have the same build.xml file (they essentially do today,
but it's because of copy/paste, not using the exact same file). This is Step 1, removing the build.xml files from each
sample directory and removing the mini project, which is redundant with the simple project now.

author: gsingers
msg: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/LUCENE-721  -- Added in Clover code coverage, thanks to Michael Busch.

Updated the xdocs with a new file named systemrequirements that details the system requirements for using Lucene.  Linked to them via the developer-resources and the releases page.  Regenerated the site.
